scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:css
scripts.postbuild:core: chmod 0755 assets assets/js assets/js/dist 2>/dev/null || true; chmod 0644 assets/js/dist/core.bundle.js assets/js/dist/core.bundle.js.map 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.postbuild:css: chmod 0755 assets assets/css assets/css/dist 2>/dev/null || true; chmod 0644 assets/css/dist/core.css 2>/dev/null || true
